info.name: Circuit board patterns
info.description: A series of morphing fractal patterns that vaguely resemble circuit boards.

renderpass.name: Image

renderpass.code:
#define fmod(x,y) mod(floor(x),y)
#define fmax(x,y,z) max(fmod(x,z),fmod(y,z))

vec2 mainSound(int samp, float time){
  
  float s1 =
      5.,

  s2 = 7.,
  t=
      time
  ,
  m1 =
      fmax(t*s1,t/s1+s1,s2)
  ,
  m4 =
      fmax(t*s1,t*s1+s1,s2)
  ,
  m3 =
      fmax(t*s1,(t+m4)*s1/(m1+.5),s2);  

  float m2 =
      1. + fmax(t/s1*2.,t/s1,s1);
  ;
  
  float a=
      pow((1.-sqrt(fract(t)))/4.,2.)
  ,

  nb = pow(2.,(m3+m2)/5.+7.);

  return
      vec2(fract(time*nb*.998)*a,fract(time*nb)*a)
  ;

}
renderpass.name: Sound
